TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OracleConnection : System.Data.Common.DbConnection, ICloneable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleConnection extends System.Data.Common.DbConnection implements class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class OracleConnection Inherits DbConnection Implements ICloneable
public ref class OracleConnection sealed : System::Data::Common::DbConnection, ICloneable
type OracleConnection = class inherit DbConnection interface ICloneable

summary.span: 代表資料庫的開啟連接。

span.span: Represents an open connection to a database.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型已被取代，並將.NET Framework 的未來版本中移除。This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md). 物件都代表唯一的連接到 Oracle 資料庫。An object represents a unique connection to an Oracle database. 在用戶端/伺服器資料庫系統，它就相當於伺服器的網路連線項目。In the case of a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server. 建立的執行個體的應用程式物件可以設定需要的所有直接和間接呼叫者有足夠的權限的程式碼的宣告式或命令式安全性需求。An application that creates an instance of the object can set declarative or imperative security demands that require all direct and indirect callers to have adequate permission to the code. 建立使用的安全性要求物件。 creates security demands by using the object. 使用者可以確認他們的程式碼使用具有足夠的權限物件。Users can verify that their code has adequate permissions by using the object. 使用者和系統管理員也可以使用程式碼存取安全性原則工具 (Caspol.exe) 來修改電腦、 使用者和企業層級的安全性原則。Users and administrators can also use the Code Access Security Policy Tool (Caspol.exe) to modify security policy at the machine, user, and enterprise levels. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6)。For more information, see [Security](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6). > [!NOTE] > 不同於**連接**中的其他.NET Framework 資料提供者 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC） 的物件不支援屬性。Unlike the **Connection** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), does not support a property. 設定連線逾時，做為屬性或連接字串中有任何作用中，並傳回的值也永遠是零。Setting a connection time-out either as a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero. 也不支援屬性或方法。 also does not support a property or a method. 如果物件超出範圍，它會保持開啟狀態。If the object goes out of scope, it remains open. 因此，您應該一律關閉藉由呼叫物件或是**Dispose**，或使用物件內`Using`陳述式。Therefore, you should always close objects by calling or **Dispose**, or by using the object within a `Using` statement. 否則，在記憶體回收可能不會釋放它們立即。Otherwise, the garbage collection might not free them immediately. 如果多個連接正在等候被記憶體回收行程期間達到的連線數目上限，這類延遲可能會導致錯誤。Such delays can cause errors if the maximum number of connections is reached while a number of connections are waiting to be deleted by the garbage collector. 相反地，藉由呼叫關閉連線增強延展性並改善整體的應用程式效能會更有效率地使用原生資源。By contrast, closing the connections by calling uses native resources more efficiently, enhancing scalability and improving overall application performance. 若要確保一律會關閉連線，開啟 內部連接`Using`區塊。To ensure that connections are always closed, open the connection inside of a `Using` block. > [!NOTE] > 若要部署高效能應用程式，您通常需要使用連接共用。To deploy high-performance applications, you often need to use connection pooling. 不過，當您使用.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 時，您不需要啟用連接共用，因為提供者會自動管理。However, when you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle, you do not need to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates an and an . 已開啟並設定為屬性。The is opened and set as the property. 此範例接著會呼叫，並關閉連線。The example then calls , and closes the connection. 若要這麼做，傳遞連接字串和查詢字串，是 SQL INSERT 陳述式。To accomplish this, the is passed a connection string and a query string that is an SQL INSERT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 開始資料庫交易。

span.span: Begins a transaction at the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction BeginTransaction() cil managed

summary.span: 開始資料庫交易。

span.span: Begins a transaction at the database.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要認可或回復交易，您必須明確地使用或方法。To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the or methods. 若要確定.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 交易管理模型正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如資料庫所提供。To ensure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the database. > [!NOTE] > 如果您未指定隔離等級，則會使用預設隔離等級。If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level is used. 若要指定隔離等級方法，請使用多載。To specify an isolation level with the method, use the overload. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates an and an . 它也會示範如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Parallel transactions are not supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要認可或回復交易，您必須明確地使用或方法。To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the or methods. 若要確定.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 交易管理模型正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如資料庫所提供。To ensure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the database. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates an and an . 它也會示範如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The name of the database to use instead of the current database.

summary.span: 為開啟的 變更目前的資料庫。

span.span: Changes the current database for an open .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`參數必須包含有效的資料庫名稱，並不能包含 null 值，也就是空字串 ("")，或只有空白字元的字串。The `value` parameter must contain a valid database name, and cannot contain a null value, an empty string (""), or a string with only blank characters. > [!NOTE] > 不同於**連接**中的其他.NET Framework 資料提供者 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC） 的物件不支援屬性。Unlike the **Connection** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), does not support a property. 設定連線逾時，做為屬性或連接字串中有任何作用中，並傳回的值也永遠是零。Setting a connection time-out either as a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero. 也不支援屬性或方法。 also does not support a property or a method.

span.span: The database name is not valid.
The connection is not open.
Cannot change the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ClearAllPools() cil managed

summary.span: 清空連接集區。

span.span: Empties the connection pool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重設 （或清空） 連接集區。 resets (or empties) the connection pool. 如果連接正在使用的呼叫時，它們已適當地標示，並會捨棄時呼叫它們。If connections are in use at the time of the call, they are marked appropriately and are discarded when is called on them.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ClearPool(class System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection connection) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ClearPool (connection As OracleConnection)

span.span: The to be cleared from the pool.

summary.span: 清空與特定連接關聯的連接集區。

span.span: Empties the connection pool associated with the specified connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會清除連接集區相關聯`connection`。 method clears the connection pool that is associated with `connection`. 如果其他連接相關聯`connection`會在使用中呼叫時，會適當地標記的人員，並會捨棄時呼叫它們。If additional connections associated with `connection` are in use at the time of the call, they are marked appropriately and are discarded when is called on them.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉與資料庫的連接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法回復任何暫止交易。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然後，它會釋放至連接集區中，連接或關閉連接，如果連接共用已停用。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 應用程式可以呼叫不止一次，而不會產生例外狀況。An application can call more than once without generating an exception. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 時，您不需要啟用連接共用，因為提供者會自動管理。When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle, you do not need to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿呼叫上，則，或在任何其他 managed 的物件`Finalize`您類別的方法。Do not call on a , a , or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在完成項中，您應該僅釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果類別未擁有任何 Unmanaged 資源，請不要在類別定義中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Oracle.Design.OracleConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定用來開啟 Oracle 資料庫的字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open an Oracle database.

value.span: Oracle 連接字串，其中包含設定，例如伺服器名稱，才能建立初始連接。

span.span: The Oracle connection string that includes settings, such as the server name, needed to establish the initial connection.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format:
## Remarks 連接關閉時，才可以設定。The can be set only when the connection is closed. 您可以使用屬性，以連接到資料庫。You can use the property to connect to a database. 下列範例說明一般連接字串。The following example illustrates a typical connection string. ``` "Data Source=Oracle8i;Integrated Security=yes" ``` 許多字串中指定的設定都有對應的唯讀屬性 (例如`Data Source=MyServer`，它會對應到屬性)。Many of the settings specified in the string have corresponding read-only properties (for example, `Data Source=MyServer`, which corresponds to the property). 設定連接字串時，所有這些屬性會更新，除非偵測到錯誤，在此情況下會更新任何屬性。When the connection string is set, all of these properties are updated, unless an error is detected, in which case none of the properties are updated. 只有預設設定或指定這些設定的屬性會傳回。 properties return only default settings or those settings specified in the . 重設關閉的連接上重設所有連接字串值 （和相關的屬性），包括密碼。Resetting the on a closed connection resets all connection string values (and related properties), including the password. 連接字串會在設定之後，立即進行剖析。The connection string is parsed immediately after being set. 如果這類剖析顯示在語法中，執行階段例外狀況的錯誤，就會產生。If parsing reveals errors in syntax, a run-time exception, such as , is generated. 嘗試開啟連接時，才可以找到其他錯誤。Other errors can be found only when an attempt is made to open the connection. 連接字串的基本格式是一系列以分號隔開的關鍵字/值組。The basic format of a connection string is a series of keyword/value pairs separated by semicolons. 等號 (=) 會連接每個關鍵字和其值。The equal sign (=) connects each keyword and its value. 若要加入包含分號、 單引號字元或雙引號字元的值，此值必須括在雙引號中。To include values that contain a semicolon, single-quote character, or double-quote character, the value must be enclosed in double quotes. 如果此值會包含一個分號和雙引號字元，此值可括在單引號中。If the value contains both a semicolon and a double-quote character, the value can be enclosed in single quotes. 單引號也是很有用，如果以雙引號字元開頭的值。The single quote is also useful if the value begins with a double-quote character. 相反地，如果值開頭的單引號，可以使用雙引號。Conversely, the double quote can be used if the value begins with a single quote. 如果此值包含單引號和雙引號字元，用來括住值的引號字元必須成對出現於值每次。If the value contains both single-quote and double-quote characters, the quote character used to enclose the value must be doubled each time it occurs within the value. 若要包含前置或尾端空格的字串值，值必須括以單引號或雙引號括住。To include preceding or trailing spaces in the string value, the value must be enclosed in either single quotes or double quotes. 會忽略整數、 布林值或列舉的值前後的任何前置或尾端空格，即使括以引號括住。Any leading or trailing spaces around integer, Boolean, or enumerated values are ignored, even if enclosed in quotes. 不過，在字串常值關鍵字或值的空格會保留。However, spaces within a string literal keyword or value are preserved. 可能不使用分隔符號，除非是以引號字元的第一個或最後一個字元，在值中，比方說，在連接字串中使用單引號或雙引號括`Data Source= my'Server`或`Data Source= my"Server`。Single or double quotes may be used within a connection string without using delimiters unless a quote character is the first or last character in the value, for example, `Data Source= my'Server` or `Data Source= my"Server`. 若要包含等號 （=） 關鍵字或值，它必須加上另一個等號。To include an equal sign (=) in a keyword or value, it must be preceded by another equal sign. 例如，在假設性的連接字串For example, in the hypothetical connection string ``` "key==word=value" ``` 關鍵字是 「 索引鍵 = word 」 且值為 「 值 」。the keyword is "key=word" and the value is "value". 如果連接字串中的關鍵字/值組中的特定關鍵字出現一次以上，最後一次出現可在設定的值。If a specific keyword in a keyword/value pair occurs more than once in a connection string, the last occurrence is used in the value set. 關鍵字不區分大小寫。Keywords are case insensitive. 下表列出內值的有效名稱。The following table lists the valid names for values within the . |名稱Name|預設Default|描述Description| |----------|-------------|-----------------| |資料來源Data Source

-或--or-

伺服器Server||要連接的 Oracle 執行個體的名稱或網路位址。The name or network address of the instance of Oracle to which to connect.| |Integrated SecurityIntegrated Security|' false''false'|連接是否或不是安全的連線。Whether the connection is to be a secure connection or not.

認得的值為`true`（強烈建議）， `false`， `yes`，和`no`。Recognized values are `true` (strongly recommended), `false`, `yes`, and `no`.| |密碼Password||登入的 Oracle 帳戶的密碼。The password for the Oracle account logging on. 為了維持高層級的安全性，我們強烈建議您改為使用整合式安全性的關鍵字。To maintain a high level of security, we strongly recommend that you use the Integrated Security keyword instead.| |Persist Security InfoPersist Security Info|' false''false'|當設定為`false`或是`no`（強烈建議），如果連接已開啟或曾經處於開啟不安全機密資訊 （例如密碼） 傳回連接的一部分。When set to `false` or `no` (strongly recommended), security-sensitive information such as the password is not returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open . 重設連接字串，就會重設所有的連接字串值，包括密碼。Resetting the connection string resets all connection string values, including the password.

可辨識的值為 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.| |UnicodeUnicode|' false''false'|指定.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 是否使用 UTF16 模式 API 呼叫。Specifies whether the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle uses UTF16 mode API calls. 除了使用 Oracle9i 用戶端軟體時，這個關鍵字會被忽略。This keyword is ignored except when using Oracle9i client software.| |User IDUser ID||Oracle 登入帳戶。The Oracle login account. 為了維持高層級的安全性，我們強烈建議您改為使用整合式安全性的關鍵字。To maintain a high level of security, we strongly recommend that you use the Integrated Security keyword instead.| 下表列出連線集區中的值的有效名稱。The following table lists the valid names for connection pooling values within the . |名稱Name|預設Default|描述Description| |----------|-------------|-----------------| |連接的存留期Connection Lifetime|00|當連接傳回集區時，會將其建立時間與目前時間進行比較，如果該時間範圍 (秒) 超過 `Connection Lifetime` 指定的值，則會損毀連接。When a connection is returned to the pool, its creation time is compared with the current time, and the connection is destroyed if that time span (in seconds) exceeds the value specified by `Connection Lifetime`. 這在叢集組態中很有用，可在執行中伺服器與剛連線的伺服器之間強制負載平衡。This is useful in clustered configurations to force load balancing between a running server and a server just brought online.

值為零會造成集區的連接具有最大的連線逾時。A value of zero causes pooled connections to have the maximum connection time-out.| |EnlistEnlist|'true''true'|當`true`或`yes`，共用器會自動登記建立執行緒的目前交易內容中的連接。When `true` or `yes`, the pooler automatically enlists the connection in the creation thread's current transaction context.

可辨識的值為 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.| |Max Pool SizeMax Pool Size|100100|集區中所允許的最大連接數。The maximum number of connections allowed in the pool. 設定`Max Pool Size`的值可能會影響效能。Setting the `Max Pool Size` value of the can affect performance. 如果您打算建立，而且主動使用超過 100 個連線，您應該增加`Max Pool Size`接近應用程式的穩定狀態連接使用方式的值。If you plan to create and actively use more than 100 connections, you should increase `Max Pool Size` to a value that approximates the steady-state connection usage for the application.| |Min Pool SizeMin Pool Size|00|連接集區中允許的最小數目。The minimum number of connections allowed in the pool.| |PoolingPooling|'true''true'|當`true`或是`yes`，則物件繪製從適當的集區，或如有必要，建立並加入適當的集區。When `true` or `yes`, the object is drawn from the appropriate pool, or if necessary, is created and added to the appropriate pool.

可辨識的值為 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.| 當設定關鍵字或連接共用需要布林值的值時，您可以使用 [是]，而不是 'true'，和 [否] 而不是 'false'。When setting keyword or connection pooling values that require a Boolean value, you can use 'yes' instead of 'true', and 'no' instead of 'false'. 整數值會表示為字串。Integer values are represented as strings. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和連接字串中設定的某些屬性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties in the connection string. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.DataSource/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.DataSource/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: virtual property int ConnectionTimeout { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得建立的連線終止嘗試並產生錯誤之前等候的時間。

span.span: Gets the time to wait to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

value.span: 等待連接開啟的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
The default value is 15 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用逾時設定的連線要等候的時間量`Connect Timeout`或`Connection Timeout`連接字串中的關鍵字。You can set the amount of time a connection waits to time out by using the `Connect Timeout` or `Connection Timeout` keywords in the connection string. 值為 0 表示無限制，並應避免在因為連線嘗試會無限期等待。A value of 0 indicates no limit, and should be avoided in a because an attempt to connect waits indefinitely. > [!NOTE] > 不同於`Connection`中的其他.NET Framework 資料提供者 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC） 的物件不支援屬性。Unlike the `Connection` object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), does not support a property. 設定連接逾時利用屬性，或連接字串中沒有任何作用，並傳回的值也永遠是零。Setting a connection time-out either with a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero. 也不支援屬性或方法。 also does not support a property or a method.

span.span: The value specified is less than 0.

span.span: Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.

value.span: 目前資料庫的名稱或連接開啟後要使用之資料庫的名稱。

span.span: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.
The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會動態更新。The property updates dynamically. 如果您變更目前的資料庫使用 SQL 陳述式或方法，會傳送參考用訊息，並自動更新的屬性。If you change the current database using a SQL statement or the method, an informational message is sent and the property is updated automatically. > [!NOTE] > 不同於`Connection`中的其他.NET Framework 資料提供者 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC） 的物件不支援屬性。Unlike the `Connection` object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), does not support a property. 設定連接逾時利用屬性，或連接字串中沒有任何作用，並傳回的值也永遠是零。Setting a connection time-out either with a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero. 也不支援屬性或方法。 also does not support a property or a method.

.method public hidebysig instance void EnlistDistributedTransaction(class System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction distributedTransaction) cil managed

param.name: distributedTransaction
param.span: 要登記之現有 的參考。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 將指定的異動登記為分散式異動。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新 ADO.NET 2.0 中是支援的使用編列到分散式交易中的方法。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體，請**EnlistTransaction**會充分利用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易，讓最好**EnlistDistributedTransaction**針對此目的。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 您可以繼續在現有的分散式的交易使用登錄You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the 如果已停用自動登記的方法。 method if auto-enlistment is disabled. 在現有的分散式異動中登記可確保，如果認可或回復交易，在資料來源的程式碼所做的修改會也認可或回復。Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction ensures that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back. 如果傳回的例外狀況已經開始使用。 returns an exception if the has already started a transaction using . 不過，如果交易是在資料來源所啟動的本機異動 (比方說，是藉由明確執行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 陳述式使用物件)，回復本機交易和登記在現有的為要求的分散式的交易。However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an object), rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested. 您不會收到通知，本機交易已回復，而且會負責管理任何本機交易無法啟動使用。You will not receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back, and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 要登記之現有 的參考。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 將指定的異動登記為分散式異動。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新 ADO.NET 2.0 中是支援的使用New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the 若要編列到分散式交易的方法。 method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體，請**EnlistTransaction**會充分利用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易，讓最好**EnlistDistributedTransaction**，它會使用**System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction**物件。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction**, which uses a **System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction** object. 它也會有稍微不同的語意： 一旦連線明確的交易上編列，無法取消登錄或另一個交易中登記，直到第一筆交易完成為止。It also has slightly different semantics: once a connection is explicitly enlisted on a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes. 如需有關分散式交易的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md).

summary.span: 傳回這個 之資料來源的結構描述資訊。

Public Overrides Function GetSchema () As DataTable

A that contains schema information.

related.span: 從資料庫取得結構描述資訊

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String) As DataTable

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要傳回之結構描述的名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

summary.span: 使用結構描述名稱的特定字串，傳回這個 之資料來源的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用查詢會區分大小寫。Queries using are case sensitive. 因為 Oracle 的處理方式的情況下先建立結構描述時，這可能會導致非預期的結果。Because of Oracle's treatment of cases when a schema is first created, this can lead to unexpected results. 如果結構描述建立不含引號`,`Oracle 會以大寫來儲存的物件名稱。If the schema was created without quotes`,` Oracle stores the object name in upper case. 如果已建立結構描述，括住，Oracle 會儲存的物件名稱中提供的大小寫。If the schema was created with quotes, Oracle stores the object name in the casing provided. 例如，假設您建立名為 MyTable，使用下列其中兩個陳述式的資料表：For example, suppose that you create a table called MyTable, using one of the following two statements: `CREATE TABLE MyTable ...` `CREATE TABLE "MyTable" ...` 若要擷取透過此資料表的相關資訊**GetSchema**方法中第一個案例中，您必須將"MYTABLE"中，做為引數。To retrieve information about this table via the **GetSchema** method in the first case, you would have to pass "MYTABLE" in as an argument. 在第二個案例中，您必須將"MyTable"中，做為引數。In the second case, you would have to pass "MyTable" in as an argument.

span.span: is specified as null.

related.span: 從資料庫取得結構描述資訊

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: override System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要傳回之結構描述的名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 所要求之結構描述的限制值集合。

span.span: A set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 使用結構描述名稱的特定字串和限制值的特定字串陣列，傳回這個 的資料來源的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `restrictionValues`參數可以提供這些值會指定特定集合的限制集合的 n 個深度。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply n depth of values which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 若要設定特定的限制值及未設定其他限制的值，您需要設定設為 null，然後放入您想要為指定值的限制中的適當值的上述限制。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 這個範例是"Tables"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果"Tables"集合有 3 個的限制： 資料庫、 owner 和資料表名稱;和您想要取回只有資料表擁有者 」 Carl"，與相關聯，則您必須傳入 （至少） 下列值： null、 「 Carl 」。If the "Tables" collection has 3 restrictions: database, owner, and table name; and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", then you would need to pass in the following values (at a minimum): null, "Carl". 如果不傳入的限制值，預設值會用於這項限制中。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 這是不同於在參數值為空字串傳遞為 null，將相同的對應。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different than passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在此情況下，則為空字串 ("") 會被視為指定參數的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. 使用查詢會區分大小寫。Queries using are case sensitive. 因為 Oracle 的處理方式的情況下先建立結構描述時，這可能會導致非預期的結果。Because of Oracle's treatment of cases when a schema is first created, this can lead to unexpected results. 如果結構描述建立不含引號`,`Oracle 會以大寫來儲存的物件名稱。If the schema was created without quotes`,` Oracle stores the object name in upper case. 如果已建立結構描述，括住，Oracle 會儲存的物件名稱中提供的大小寫。If the schema was created with quotes, Oracle stores the object name in the casing provided. 例如，假設您建立名為 MyTable，使用下列其中兩個陳述式的資料表：For example, suppose that you create a table called MyTable, using one of the following two statements: `CREATE TABLE MyTable ...` `CREATE TABLE "MyTable" ...` 若要擷取透過此資料表的相關資訊**GetSchema**方法中第一個案例中，您必須將"MYTABLE"中，做為引數。To retrieve information about this table via the **GetSchema** method in the first case, you would have to pass "MYTABLE" in as an argument. 在第二個案例中，您必須將"MyTable"中，做為引數。In the second case, you would have to pass "MyTable" in as an argument.

span.span: is specified as null.

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event InfoMessage As OracleInfoMessageEventHandler

summary.span: 當 Oracle 傳送警告或資訊訊息時發生。

span.span: Occurs when Oracle sends a warning or an informational message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 資料提供者會收到成功與資訊訊息時，請使用 Oracle Call Interface (OCI)，就會產生事件。Because the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle uses the Oracle Call Interface (OCI), whenever the data provider receives a Success With Info message, an event is generated. 舉例來說，就會產生包含語法錯誤的預存程序。An example would be creating a stored procedure that contains a syntax error. 若要呼叫方法會成功。The call to the method would succeed. 不過會產生事件，通知您有語法錯誤。However an event would be generated informing you of the syntax error. 用戶端想要處理警告或參考伺服器所傳送的訊息應該建立委託以接聽此事件。Clients who want to process warnings or informational messages sent by the server should create an delegate to listen to this event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Open() cil managed

summary.span: 所指定的屬性設定開啟資料庫的連接。

span.span: Opens a connection to a database with the property settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接集區中繪製的開啟連接，如果有的話。The draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available. 否則，它會建立新的連接到資料庫。Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to the database. > [!NOTE] > 如果超出範圍，它代表的連接不會關閉自動。If the goes out of scope, the connection it represents does not close automatically. 因此，您必須明確地關閉連接呼叫。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling .

span.span: The connection is not open.
Cannot change the database.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ServerVersion As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ServerVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字串，包含用戶端所連接之伺服器的版本。

span.span: Gets a string containing the version of the server to which the client is connected.
The version of the connected server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的 Oracle 版本格式。The property is in Oracle version format. 比方說，Oracle8 版本的格式是在表單中的字串"8.1.7.0.0 Oracle8 發行 8.1.7.0.0-生產環境。 」For example, the format for an Oracle8 release is a string in the form "8.1.7.0.0 Oracle8 Release 8.1.7.0.0 - Production." ## Examples 下列範例會建立並顯示其部分唯讀屬性。The following example creates an and displays some of its read-only properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection.ServerVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.ServerVersion/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection.ServerVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.ServerVersion/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The connection is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property State As ConnectionState
public: virtual property System::Data::ConnectionState State { System::Data::ConnectionState get(); };

summary.span: 取得連線目前的狀態。

span.span: Gets the current state of the connection.
A bitwise combination of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允許的狀態變更如下：The allowed state changes are: - 從`Closed`要`Open`，並使用`Open`方法物件。From `Closed` to `Open`, using the `Open` method of the object. - 從`Open`要`Closed`，並使用方法物件。From `Open` to `Closed`, using the method of the object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立在衍生類別的執行個體，設定其，並顯示其。The following example creates an instance of a derived class, , sets its , and displays its . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection.State#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.State/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection.State#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.State/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.IDbTransaction System.Data.IDbConnection.BeginTransaction() cil managed
Function BeginTransaction () As IDbTransaction Implements IDbConnection.BeginTransaction

summary.span: 開始資料庫異動。

span.span: Begins a database transaction.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成交易後，則您必須明確地認可或回復使用中交易或方法。Once the transaction has completed, you must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction by using the or methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.IDbTransaction System.Data.IDbConnection.BeginTransaction(valuetype System.Data.IsolationLevel il) cil managed
Function BeginTransaction (il As IsolationLevel) As IDbTransaction Implements IDbConnection.BeginTransaction

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 使用指定的 值來開始資料庫交易。

span.span: Begins a database transaction with the specified value.
An object that represents the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成交易後，則您必須明確地認可或回復使用中交易或方法。Once the transaction has completed, you must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction by using the or methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Data.IDbConnection.ChangeDatabase(string value) cil managed
Sub ChangeDatabase (value As String) Implements IDbConnection.ChangeDatabase

param.name: value
param.span: 用於代替目前資料庫的資料庫名稱。

span.span: The name of the database to use in place of the current database.

summary.span: 為開啟的 Connection 物件變更目前的資料庫。

span.span: Changes the current database for an open Connection object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.IDbCommand System.Data.IDbConnection.CreateCommand() cil managed
Function CreateCommand () As IDbCommand Implements IDbConnection.CreateCommand

summary.span: 建立並傳回與連接相關聯的 Command 物件。

span.span: Creates and returns a Command object that is associated with the connection.

returns.span: 與連接相關聯的 Command 物件。

span.span: A Command object that is associated with the connection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance object System.ICloneable.Clone() cil managed
Function Clone () As Object Implements ICloneable.Clone

summary.span: 建立目前執行個體複本的新物件。

span.span: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.

returns.span: 這個執行個體複本的新物件。

span.span: A new object that is a copy of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
